name: Cubes!
overview: A puzzle game created by C. E. Prince aka Spock and published in Loadstar #106. In this game you try to make the large grid on the left look exactly like the smaller grid on the right. You move the square cursor around and rotate the four cubes inside the cursor either counter-clockwise (left) or clockwise (right). Try to match both pictures in the fewest moves possible and in the shortest time. When you match, the program will announce that you have won!
